metadata.subject: Fw: WaPo story-- Trump's outside counsel

relationships.description: Reid Weingarten is being considered for outside counsel role for President Trump
Ashley Parker is a reporter covering the White House for Washington Post

analysis.purpose: To forward a journalist's inquiry about Reid Weingarten being considered as outside counsel for President Trump
analysis.significance: Shows media outreach regarding Trump's legal team selection process and Weingarten's potential role

notable_quotes: we understand you're one of the finalists for the role, and have already spoken with senior White House officials
I just wanted to let you know that we plan to mention your name (and of course see if you want to comment)

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced

details: Washington Post story about Trump's outside counsel selection
Ashley Parker and Bob Costa preparing article
Request for comment from Reid Weingarten

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be routine media outreach regarding Trump administration legal staffing decisions, which was likely reported publicly

analysis.summary: Washington Post reporter Ashley Parker contacts Reid Weingarten regarding a story about President Trump's selection of outside counsel, indicating Weingarten is a finalist for the role and has spoken with senior White House officials.
